title: Acidic Endgame
desc:
Post 486
- Can only be played after 10 rounds have passed. However, if this would be your last card, you can play it regardless.
__- All current and future cards become <:colorless:1106434944261177374>.__
__- After taking their turn, a player discards 1/5 of their total hand (rounded down). (A minimum of one card will always be discarded.)__
